data.message: Hay Facebook put a setting in there to stop getting Game requests. It's everyday from someone it's getting a little annoying.

replies.message: Hi James. When you block an app or game, it won't be able to access any of your Facebook information or send you any requests. If you no longer want an app or game to contact you, please remove it. To learn how to block an app or game, please visit our Help Center at: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/121070141307903. -Hailey
How do I delete my cellphone number from my contact imformation on my facebook I tryed deleting it but having trouble?
Facebook I'm getting the requests to play I don't have ANY GAMES on my phone. Just make it easy and put a setting that says DO NOT WANT ANY GAME REQUEST FROM ANY ONE AT ALL ON AND GAME,
Exactly! I do not want ANY game requests for any reason, there needs to be a way to block all games
I don't want to have to individually block games. What there needs to be is a universal block for all games in settings.
James, you can still go to your setting and block these game request. You don't have to have played them before
FB, I tried to remove or delete a page that I never use but no successful.

I can't untag myself from a photo a friend uploaded. I have tried the instructions you gave but I get the message: you can't remove the tag at this moment try later....but I I have been trying since September 2014 with no results.
